items.summary:
For 2-days only, Woot is offering factory reconditioned AirPods Pro 2 with the latest MagSafe USB-C case down at $107.99 when you apply code EARBUDS20 at checkout. Shipping is free for Prime members, but you’ll get hit with a $6 delivery fee otherwise. Regularly $249 and currently on sale for $169.99 in brand new condition at Amazon, today’s deal is the best price we can find from a reputable source by a long shot.
